message: I propose a fair split, considering the inflation we both need to take into account.  I'll take 90% and you get 10%.
I think a more balanced split is fair considering the inflation.  Let's each take a good chunk of the money.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 60/40, with me taking 60% and you taking 40%. This is a good deal considering the inflation and gives us both a decent share.
